meanings.definition: A person who fences with a foil.
meanings.sent1: The young foilsmen practiced their moves in the fencing class.
meanings.sent2: The foilsmen competed in the tournament with skill and determination.
meanings.sent3: The foilsmen decided to have a friendly match to see who was the best fencer.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fencing, the foilsmen are like graceful dancers with swords.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the foilsmen for their precise footwork and quick reflexes.
